title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.40 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.40 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

Notice of the time, place, and nature of a hearing will
be given by the Board to all parties to a proceeding at least 10 days in
advance of the date of the hearing unless otherwise agreed by the
parties. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.40

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
